props.name: refId
props.displayName: The ID of the entry which the file(s) will be linked to

props.name: reference
props.displayName: The name of the model which the file(s) will be linked to

props.name: field
props.displayName: The field of the entry which the file(s) will be precisely linked to

props.name: source
props.displayName: (optional): The name of the plugin where the model is located
